title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on Linux, running build 20011127, the tool items including the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X) move below the label. This behavior is not observed on build 20011116 on Nt2000. The movement of these icons may confuse users.
EB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the tool items including the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X) should remain aligned with the label and not move downwards.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Navigator view on Linux, running build 20011127.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
3. Observe the movement of the tool items, pulldown menu icon, and the close icon.
